bad_channel.text: :tv: You have to be in a channel to do this.

error.text: :thinking_face: Hmm, I don't know that command... Try `/${cmd} help`

help.text: Use the `/${cmd}` command to access this channel's Google Drive folder

attachments.text:
`/${cmd}` will show this message
`/${cmd} link` will fetch the link to Google Drive

link.text: :mantelpiece_clock: Hold on while I talk to Google Drive...

not_permitted.text: :crying_cat_face: Sorry, you aren't allowed to do this yet.
